name: West of Loathing
description: West of Loathing — a slapstick comedy stick-figure wild west adventure role-playing game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 4 GB available space
